name: AM Data Service
tag_list: it-support, it-consulting, detroit-it-support, michigan-it-consultants, network-monitoring, managed-services
overview:
AM Data Service is a Microsoft Partner, Cisco Premiere Partner, IBM Partner, EMC Partner, OnBase Authorized Partner and VMware partner providing IT Consulting, Enterprise level Data Center Technology Configuration and Deployment, ECM system implementation and workflow design as well as IT support and network services to businesses of all sizes in Michigan, Florida, Alabama and around throughout the US.

AM Data Service, Inc. provides several services from Data Center Environment design and deployment, to Electronic Content Management and Network Service and Support.

AM Data offers preventative maintenance and comprehensive real-time monitoring of your critical network and desktop devices to enhance the stability of IT assets.

Certified Enterprise Content Management (ECM) and Document Imaging Engineers can work with you to develop OnBase ECM solutions for your business that can add efficiency and reduce overhead. AM Data offers Remote and On-Site engagements that can include Workflow Development, Workflow Programming and Scripting, Infrastructure Design and Analysis, as well as System Administration.
